message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!

Thank you for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  While your product is intriguing, I'm going to need a lower price to make this work for me.  I'm willing to pay $950,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,050,000. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
